name: UICloudSharingController.PermissionOptions
desc: A set of options that determine the permission options available to the user when viewing the Cloud sharing controller screens.

items.name: static var allowPublic: UICloudSharingController.PermissionOptions
items.desc: The option that grants access to anyone who has the share link.

items.name: static var allowPrivate: UICloudSharingController.PermissionOptions
items.desc: The option that restricts access to people who have been invited.

items.name: static var allowReadOnly: UICloudSharingController.PermissionOptions
items.desc: The option that gives participants read-only permission to the shared data.

items.name: static var allowReadWrite: UICloudSharingController.PermissionOptions
items.desc: The option that gives participants read/write permission to the shared data.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new permission option set with the given raw integer value.
